title: Exclusive: AES in talks to sell major coal-fired power plant in Vietnam - sources
summary: HANOI/PRAGUE/SEOUL, Nov 17 ( Reuters ) - U.S. energy firm AES Corp. ( AES.N ) is in talks to sell its majority stake in one of Vietnam's largest coal-fired power plants, two people familiar with the discussions said, as part of its global strategy to divest coal assets by the end of 2025.
